Kass FM broadcasts in Kalenjin, currently broadcasting in Nairob, including Machakos, Thika, Kiambu and Limuru; in the Rift Valley, including Nakuru, Eldoret, Kitale, Baringo, Kapenguria, Timboroa, Gilgill, Naivasha, Bomet, Litein and Kericho; on the Coast region, including Mombasa, Malindi, Mtwapa, Changamwe, Ukunda and Kilifi; and in parts of Western and Nyanza including Kakamega, Kisumu and Kisii.
